mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FREEBOARD( FBTITLE, FBCONT, FBIP, MEMID, BOARDID ) VALUES( #{fbtitle}, #{fbcont}, #{fbip}, #{memid}, #{boardid} )
mapper.select: SELECT FBID, FBTITLE, FBCONT, FBCOUNT, FBIP, BOARDID, MEMID, FBREC FROM FREEBOARD WHERE FBID= #{fbid}
SELECT FBID, FBTITLE, MEMID, FBDATE, FBCOUNT, FBREC FROM FREEBOARD ORDER BY FBID ASC
